author: Simon Difford
description: The Ford Cocktail is a Martini-style cocktail sweetened by both the use of old tom gin and Bénédictine D.O.M. liqueur (not Bénédictine B&B) served 'wet' with a generous splash of dry vermouth. The orange bitters and zest are essential to the drink's success.
name: Ford Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
